data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

How the investment was actioned is also detailed.

data.fullContent: In this chapter some of the rationale behind that investment, has been outlined especially the evidence that open education and social media are growing trends in the education sector and society generally, therefore providing an argument for the need for educational institutions to engage and participate in OER. In the chapter on Development the reasons for making that investment, including the detailing of several models of education are presented and includes an analysis of the return ( ROI ) in terms of traditional objectives and financial return. How the investment was actioned is also detailed.
data.answer: 在本章中，一些投资背后的基本原理已经被概述，特别是证据表明，开放教育和社交媒体在教育部门和社会总体上是不断增长的趋势，因此为教育机构参与和参与OER提供了一个理由。在关于发展的一章中，介绍了进行这种投资的原因，包括详细介绍了几种教育模式，并从传统目标和财务回报两方面分析了投资回报率(ROI)。投资是如何进行的也很详细。
